name: Cascade Property Services
address: 1261 NW Crosby Ave Unit A, Oak Harbor, WA 98277

reviews.author: Kimberly Dudeck
reviews.review: If I could give zero starts I would. Same exact situation as the reviews posted below. Moved out almost three weeks ago and cannot get a hold of Steve. Hes ignoring texts, calls and emails, but had the time to deactivate my account on the

reviews.author: Heather Rae
reviews.review: Absolutely do not rent from Steve. We had mold growing everywhere in our apartment in which we were given one small box of baking powder. We had a water leak the entire time we lived there that they fixed multiple times, but it was never

reviews.author: Alivia A
reviews.review: I honestly wish I could put zero stars. This is hands down the laziest business in the Oak Harbor area. This was my husband and Is first renting experience and its been absolutely horrible. For starters, we had a few things go wrong in

reviews.author: J Witness
reviews.review: We wanted to apply for a house, only way was online, then we tried and tried to get ahold of someone at Cascade Property Services with no luck (in person, via phone and email). This scam is pretty sad. The office looks empty, the phone was

reviews.author: Sasha Simmons
reviews.review: Nice neighborhood but you can hear your neighbors in their apartment when they walk or run especially if they like to run up and down the stairs. When one neighbor flashes or showers you can hear the water running from the living room. It

reviews.author: Robert Sukovaty
reviews.review: Do not rent from this company. I'm truly sad to have to write this but I was very disappointed with this property management. Steve was a terrible manager. He never answered the phone. I rented from them for 2 solid years and never had a

reviews.author: jay palmer
reviews.review: We have started having issues with Steve Springer the "manager" as he doesn't return phone calls or emails. He sends the maintenance man over without notice. Had threatened eviction for no reason and doesn't fix ANYTHING! We have no drawer

reviews.author: Sarahlyn Hewitt
reviews.review: We lived in the Ruth Villa apartments for about a year. We didn't have much trouble living them besides a serious ant problem. They wanted to bomb our apartment but I said no because I have a pet and I didn't want her sick. Every apartment

reviews.author: Katie
reviews.review:
DO. NOT. DO. IT.
I REPEAT.
DO NOT RENT WITH STEVE SPRINGER.

reviews.author: Andrew C
reviews.review: Was renting through cascade for 3+ years. No issues while actually renting as I payed rent on time. Issues are after you move out. Do not expect to get any of the security deposit you put down back. We spent $450 dollars to have house

reviews.author: OH Local
reviews.review: Save your time and frustration, just forget they exist. If you have to pay a few more dollars to rent through someone else do it.

reviews.author: LadyBugg
reviews.review: Got into a house quickly! Steve is Great and can get you into a home you need!

reviews.author: Melodie Williams
reviews.review: Does anybody happen to know if the hours are correct? Will he actually be there during those hours?....Ive been trying to get ahold of him to get into a different place as places need to contact previous landlord and I cant seem to get ahold of him. Help!

reviews.author: Tiffany Wilson
reviews.review: Stay far away. The landlord is impossible to get ahold of. And you will have to seek legal action to get your security deposit back.

reviews.author: Taylor Adams
reviews.review: NEVER answers the phone during business hours. Can't wait to move tf out of this place. Try somewhere else cuz these people don't deserve your money.

reviews.author: Nick Sanabria
reviews.review: Best landlord I've had in Oak Harbor

reviews.author: M MO Morrison
reviews.review: Great company to do business with.

ownerResponse.text: We are honored by your praises.  Thank you.
Thank you, Quentin. We have hundreds of happy tenants and are always thrilled to hear from them.  We're glad we could help you.
